ComicInfo.Series: Grimm Fairy Tales Presents Jungle Book: Fall of the Wild
ComicInfo.Summary:
You are cordially invited to the Royal Wedding of King Louis and his chosen bride...and you won't believe who it is! But the wedding bells may be stopped short as Kaa the Python decides to crash the party! Plus Mowglii and Bagheera run for their lives as the island itself seem to be turning against them!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 1 | B | Cover B | Carlos Granda & Ross Campbell | 2 | C | Cover C | Giuseppe Cafaro, Simone Di Meo & Alessia Nocera | 3 | D | Retailer Incentive Cover | Jamie Tyndall (c) & Ula Mos (c) | 4 | *Notes:* Cover B is a homage of the movie poster for Jaws.
